group_1.textRight: Hm... I'm more rattled than I thought I would be.
I belong to a mutual aid organization,

group_1.textCenter: known as the Blue Seas Family.
Although it's not as prominent as it once was,
it had a hand in some of the more "off-the-books"@dealings here in Kamihama.
A few years ago, the Blue Seas Family@was falsely blamed for a murder.
The resulting police investigation nearly@drove the organization into the ground.
It was then that I was approached by Kyubey@and became a Magical Girl.
I used my wish to plant false@evidence that cleared our names.
Thanks to that, everyone in the Blue Seas Family,@including myself, escaped prosecution.
Even so, the public image of the Blue Seas@Family remained tarnished.
I hadn't anticipated that our members would@suffer misfortune because of my wish.
That resentment ultimately put@the entire Family in danger...
I had hoped that I would return to@my ordinary days with the others,
without relying on brute force in my endeavors,@without hurting people.
But instead, I only kept myself in safety@and hurt them from afar.
I was like a spoiled child back then...
And yet I don't regret becoming a Magical Girl.

group_1.textRight: During the police investigation, the Blue Seas@Family was on the brink of collapse.
But even though this treachery put us in danger,
had our members attempted to fight back with@brashness and force, it would have been a disaster.
While I don't want to use@force to solve my problems,
I've chosen to maintain my power as a deterrence,@despite the hardships it may bring.
Because that was how I could return to my ordinary@days once more, and give myself a future.
And now that such has come to pass,@I will assuredly have no regrets.
By making my contract, I went on to@meet friends that I've grown to trust.
They're the ones who are@keeping me on the right path.
They give me strength that I never would've@found had I not become a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: Your desire to protect your@friends gives birth to new ones.
And thus the fire in your pure@heart burns ever brighter...
It's so bellissimo that I long to see more...!
